skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calming ocean
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Calming Ocean plays music at 174 Hz frequency and is a frequency believed to reduce pain, enhance emotional power, and improve concentration. This mixes in with ocean waves recorded on the island of Maui. 

WHY CHOOSE RELAXING SLEEP SOUNDS: CALMING OCEAN 

- 5 hours of enhanced looping included FREE!
- High-Quality Stereo audio included for FREE!

GOLD EDITION
- Loop free audio that plays through the entire night
- Premium sound quality
- Super Enhanced looping: 10-hour audio

FREE VERSION
- 5+ hour audio (most free skills offer 1 hour)
- Loop setting
- High-Quality Stereo Audio

GETTING STARTED:
- Enable this skill by clicking the yellow enable button above and then say, "Alexa, open Calming Ocean."

THE SOUNDS
This audio was custom created for this Alexa skill by Chase Baker. It is designed to promote peace, tranquility, healing, and concentration. The Ocean Waves were recorded on Maui in the Hawaiian Islands. 

Please consider rating Relaxing Sleep sounds. If you have any sound recommendations, feedback, or questions, please contact me at relaxingsleep.alexa@gmail.com.

If you enjoy this Sleep Sound Skill, please check out my others!
